name: Next.js
description: Next.js is a React-based framework for building fast, scalable, and SEO-friendly web applications with server-side rendering and static site generation.
creator: Vercel

features.title: Server-Side Rendering (SSR)
features.description: Renders pages on the server for improved performance and SEO.

features.title: Static Site Generation (SSG)
features.description: Generates static pages at build time for faster load times.

features.title: App Router
features.description: File-based routing system with layouts, streaming, and nested routes.

features.title: API Routes
features.description: Create backend APIs directly inside the application.

features.title: Image Optimization
features.description: Automatic image optimization for better performance.
